sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./styles/TeacherProfile.css"; export default function TeacherProfile() { const [teacher, setTeacher] = useState({ name: "Ayesha Malik", email: "ayesha.malik@school.edu.pk", employeeId: "TCH-2025-09", contact: "0301-1234567", cnic: "35202-1234567-8", department: "Mathematics", qualification: "MSc Mathematics", joiningDate: "2021-08-15", }); return (

üë©‚Äçüè´ Teacher Profile

{teacher.name}

Employee ID: {teacher.employeeId}

Email: {teacher.email}

Contact: {teacher.contact}

CNIC: {teacher.cnic}

Department: {teacher.department}

Qualification: {teacher.qualification}

Joining Date: {teacher.joiningDate}

); }
